column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from March 29 through May 3, 2004.The minutes are attached.Attachment (68 KB PDF) 2004 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: July 8, 2004
